com.st.st25sdk.iso14443sr

Class STIso14443SRTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.NFCTag
      • com.st.st25sdk.iso14443sr.STIso14443SRTag
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SRi2KTag, SRi4KTag, SRi512Tag, SRiX4KTag, SRT512Tag, ST25TB02KTag, ST25TB04KTag, ST25TB512ACTag, ST25TB512ATTag

    public class STIso14443SRTag
extends NFCTag
    Defines all required methods to handle SRi, SRiX, SRT, ST25TB series

                       byte[] data)
